name: hubspot-cms-tools
description: CLI tools for working with HubSpot

scripts.publish-release: branch=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && [ $branch = master ] && yarn lerna publish --conventional-graduate --exact || echo 'Error: New release can only be published on master branch' >&2
scripts.publish-prerelease: branch=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && [ $branch = master ] && yarn lerna publish prerelease --preid beta --dist-tag next --exact || echo 'Error: New release can only be published on master branch' >&2
